name: nonviral
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not caused by or relating to a virus: Hepatitis can have nonviral causes, for example alcohol and drugs. Flu symptoms can resemble those of nonviral bacterial infections that affect the respiratory system.
More examplesFewer examplesBoth viral and nonviral techniques are currently used in gene therapy.It is as yet unknown whether bats are hosts of non-viral pathogens such as bacteria.There may be a correlation between asthma admissions and specific viral infections, but it's hard to tell because of the far greater number of admissions for asthma caused by non-viral factors.
